comments: A089911(a(n)) = 9. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 05 2013Also the number of cube units that frame a cube of edge length n+1. _Peter M. Chema_, Mar 27 2016
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3000
example: For n=3; a(3)= 12*3+8 = 44.Thus, there are 44 cube units that frame a cube of edge length 4. - _Peter M. Chema_, Mar 26 2016
prog: (MAGMA) [12*n+8: n in [0..60]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 08 2011(Haskell)a017617 = (+ 8) . (* 12)  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 05 2013(PARI) x='x+O('x^99); Vec(4*(2+x)/(1-x)^2) \\ _Altug Alkan_, Mar 27 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
